<title level="1" pfs="">[Xulgath Deepmouth](/Monsters.aspx?ID=881)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Xulgath deepmouths wield the powers of the [Abyss](/Planes.aspx?ID=13) against their clutch's enemies and invoke righteous fear in their followers. The vast majority of deepmouths worship demon lords, most commonly [Zevgavizeb](/Deities.aspx?ID=82). Scalescribing—the warping of xulgath flesh into imitations of [Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12) script—is a widespread practice among deepmouths, enabling them to channel the power of the Abyss through their fanatical devotees' own bodies.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 32

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Xulgath_XulgathDeepmouth.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 12">[Xulgath Deepmouth](/Monsters.aspx?ID=881)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Xulgath" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=244" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands](/Sources.aspx?ID=33) pg. 85</row>

**Perception** +26; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +22, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +22, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +25, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +25, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +25, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +25, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +22

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +4

**Wis** +7

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [spiked gauntlet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=11)_, [_+1 hide armor_](/Armor.aspx?ID=7), bone [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Zevgavizeb](/Deities.aspx?ID=82), [Material Component Pouch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=33)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 33 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +22 

**Will** +25 

</row>

**HP** 215

**Stench** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)) 30 feet. A creature that enters the area must attempt a DC 28 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), and on a critical failure, the creature also takes a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. While within the aura, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to all xulgaths' stenches for 1 minute.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_spiked gauntlet_ +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Free-Hand](/Traits.aspx?ID=181), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d4+6 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +20,
**Damage** 2d6+6 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 2d4+6 slashing

**Divine Prepared Spells** DC 33, attack +27
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Protection](/Spells.aspx?ID=238), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) (×2)
- **2nd**
[Status](/Spells.aspx?ID=308) (×3)
- **3rd**
[Heroism](/Spells.aspx?ID=149), [Meld into Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=188), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354)
- **4th**
[Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6) (×2)
- **5th**
[Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (×2), [Ravening Maw](/Spells.aspx?ID=647)
- **6th**
[Divine Wrath](/Spells.aspx?ID=86), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (×6), [Repulsion](/Spells.aspx?ID=254) (×2), [Enervation](/Spells.aspx?ID=687)

**Cleric Domain Spells** DC 33, 3 Focus Points
- **6th**
[Commanding Lash](/Spells.aspx?ID=408), [Vibrant Thorns](/Spells.aspx?ID=467)

**Divine Rituals** DC 1

- **2nd**
[Consecrate](/Rituals.aspx?ID=8)
- **6th**
[Commune](/Rituals.aspx?ID=6)

**Devourer's Dictum** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) The deepmouth warps part of a scalescribed creature's flesh into a mouthed tentacle, then wills it to lash out. The deepmouth makes a jaws Strike that originates from any living scalescribed creature within 120 feet; this Strike also has [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) and deals an additional 2d8 negative damage. If the Strike originates from a creature other than the deepmouth, that creature triggers reactions as though it had made the Strike.

**Scalescribe**  ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) With 10 minutes of work, a deepmouth can carve a magical rune called a scalescript on the flesh of a living, willing xulgath (including the deepmouth itself). A creature cannot be inscribed with more than one scalescribe rune at a time, and a deepmouth can create and maintain no more than three scalescripts at a time. If the deepmouth Scalescribed itself, it can provide material and somatic components while Casting a Spell without a free hand.

</column>
